extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    A grade of C in JAPN 200/6.0 or permission of the Department of Languages, Literatures and Cultures. 
EXCLUSION     No more than 6.0 units from JAPN 300/6.0; JAPN 301/3.0; JAPN 302/3.0

basic.description:
Intermediate study of the structural patterns of the language, with intensive training in listening, speaking, reading, and writing. Extensive use of audio-visual materials.
NOTE    Students with previous study background must take a placement test during orientation week.
basic.subject: JAPN
basic.title: Intermediate Japanese I
